As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said,`` I care deeply about animals'' and`` am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals.'' He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event.

Since his return, in October, Ben Roethlisberger has tried to be a better teammate and a better person. Like the Eagles' Michael Vick , he has been contrite and has said all the right things. It would be amazing to win another Super Bowl, but it won't be like I'll say,` Do you forgive me now?' It'll just be another step in earning back everything I lost, he told the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette's Ron Cook last week.
